EntryName	RPB3_HUMAN
ProteinName	DNA-directed RNA polymerase II subunit RPB3 (RNA polymerase II subunit 3) (RNA polymerase II subunit B3) (DNA-directed RNA polymerase II 33 kDa polypeptide) (RPB33) (DNA-directed RNA polymerase II subunit C) (RPB31)
GeneName	POLR2C A-152E5.7
Length	275
Function	Core component of RNA polymerase II (Pol II), a DNA-dependent RNA polymerase which synthesizes mRNA precursors and many functional non-coding RNAs using the four ribonucleoside triphosphates as substrates.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
